title: Bug 7752 - Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails.
description:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create two projects, each containing a file named "foo.txt"
2. Export both projects to a zip file
3. Note that the zip file fails to store both "foo.txt" files correctly.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, the zip file fails to store all files correctly. For example, when two projects contain a file named "foo.txt", only one "foo.txt" file is stored in the zip file.
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories. In this case, both "foo.txt" files from each project should be included in the zip file.
SR:
1. Create two projects, each containing a file named "foo.txt"
2. Export both projects to a zip file
3. Verify that the zip file contains both "foo.txt" files, each in their respective directories.
